submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse= True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse= True)
        # print(horizontalCut)
        
        
        h, v= 1, 1
        mnCost = 0
        i=0
        j=0
        
        while i<m-1 and j<n-1:
            if horizontalCut[i] > verticalCut[j]:
                mnCost+= horizontalCut[i] * v
                h+=1
                i+=1
            else:
                mnCost+= verticalCut[j] * h
                v+=1
                j+=1
                
        # print(mnCost)
                
        remaining = 0
        flag1, flag2= False, False
        while i<m-1:
            remaining+= horizontalCut[i]
            i+=1
            flag1= True
          
        if flag1:
            mnCost+= remaining* v
        
            
        while j<n-1:
            remaining+= verticalCut[j]
            j+=1
            flag2= True
         
        if flag2:
            mnCost+= remaining* h
        
        return mnCost
